statements: DELETE FROM employee_goals WHERE employee_id = 1 AND goal_name = 'Sales'
DELETE FROM employee_goals WHERE goal_description LIKE '%improve%'
DELETE FROM employee_goals WHERE employee_id = 100 AND goal_name = 'Improve Sales';
DELETE FROM employee_goals WHERE goal_description LIKE '%improve%' AND progress < 50;
DELETE FROM employee_goals WHERE employee_id = 101;
DELETE FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_id IN (1, 2, 3);
DELETE FROM employee_goals WHERE employee_id = 101 AND target_date < '2022-12-31';
DELETE FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_id = 500 AND metric_value > 80.0;
DELETE FROM EmployeeProgress WHERE progress_id = 101;
DELETE FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE metric_id = 202;
DELETE FROM EmployeeGoals WHERE employee_id = 100 AND due_date < '2022-10-01';
DELETE FROM EmployeeProgress WHERE status = 'completed' AND progress_percentage <= 50;
DELETE FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
DELETE FROM progress WHERE progress_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM metrics WHERE metric_id = 1;
DELETE FROM progress WHERE progress_status = 'Incomplete';
DELETE FROM progress WHERE employee_id = 1;
DELETE FROM performance_metrics WHERE date_recorded < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM progress WHERE employee_id = 101 AND date_recorded < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM goals WHERE end_date < '2022-06-30' AND goal_id IN (SELECT goal_id FROM progress WHERE progress_percentage < 50);
